SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, A.* FROM ( select rs.reserve_SMS_no, p.patient_name, e.employee_name, p.phone, TO_CHAR(rs.datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as datetime, rs.template_name from reserve_SMS rs join template t on t.template_name = rs.template_name join employee e on e.employee_id = rs.employee_id join reserve r on r.reserve_no = rs.reserve_no join patient p on p.patient_no = r.patient_no order by rs.reserve_SMS_no desc ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) WHERE rn >= #{startRow, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: insert into reserve_sms (RESERVE_SMS_NO , EMPLOYEE_ID , TEMPLATE_NAME , RESERVE_NO , DATETIME) values (reserve_SMS_no.nextval, #{employeeId}, #{templateName}, #{reserveNo}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, A.* FROM ( select cs.common_SMS_no, p.patient_name, e.employee_name, p.phone, TO_CHAR(cs.datetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as datetime, cs.content from common_SMS cs join employee e on e.employee_id = cs.employee_id join patient p on p.patient_no = cs.patient_no order by cs.common_SMS_no desc ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) WHERE rn >= #{startRow, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
